name: Workflow 2B: Poll & Retrieve Bria Images (No Fallbacks - Human Intervention)

nodes.name: Send Error to Human
nodes.notes: Configure this to send to Slack, Email, or your preferred notification system

parameters.responseBody: ={{ { success: $json.canProceedToWorkflow3, message: $json.canProceedToWorkflow3 ? 'Workflow 2B completed successfully' : 'Workflow 2B completed with errors - human intervention required', processed: $json.totalProcessed, briaSuccess: $json.successfulBria, errors: $json.errors, workflow3Triggered: $json.workflow3Triggered || false } }}
